meanings.definition: To finish or bring to an end.
meanings.sent1: She completes her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The puzzle completes when all pieces fit together.
meanings.sent3: The race completes with a turtle crossing the finish line first!
meanings.sent4: His smile completes the picture of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The final piece completes the jigsaw puzzle perfectly.

meanings.sent1: Adding the missing ingredient completes the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The last brushstroke completes the painting.
meanings.sent3: His silly hat completes his wacky outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter completes the joyful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The shining star completes the constellation beautifully.

meanings.sent1: He completes the task with precision.
meanings.sent2: The team completes the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The clown completes his act with a funny dance.
meanings.sent4: Her determination completes the challenging journey.
meanings.sent5: The chef completes the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.
